thread.title_full: Heaven Gifts E-Cigarette reviewed by kittyjvr1

author: kittyjvr1
title: kittyjvr1
text:
Wotofo Troll RTA
I won the Troll RTA from Heaven Gifts and I had the honor of opening and reviewing this RTA.
The Troll RTA by WOTOFO has a Genesis style (GTA) design. A unique single post deck with 4 terminals and large wicking ports for big builds and easy wicking system. The terminals are 2.5 x 2mm and the screws are philips head capscrews. The top delrin cap has embedded stainless steel threading minimising the risk of stripping the topcap threads. Huge and I mean huge fill holes makes it extremely easy to fill. The threading is super smooth.
Some Features:
24mm Diameter
Stainless Steel & Pyrex Glass Construction
Threaded Top Fill Design
5ml Tank Capacity
Unique Single Post Design with 4 terminals
PEEK Insulator Made In Germany
4 large Wicking Ports
Dual Adjustable Bottom Airflow
Gold Plated 510 Pin
The cloud production on the Troll RTA is superb, but the flavour, oh wow, just AMAZING.
I experienced no spitback and no leakage. A must have for all you serious builders and flavour chasers.
The delivery from Heavengifts was superfast. The RTA arrived within 4 days from China to South Africa.
